summary: Replace the Dragonscale Helmet with the Dragonplate Helmet
descriptionHtml:
[size=20][color=red]discontinued[/size][/color] i stopped modding years ago i just dont have the time anymore sorry

Since the Dragonscale Helmet looks really ugly and someone asked me to change it to the Dragonplate Helmet i decided to release this

Installation:
Unzip into Data folder. Activate "DS_to_Dragonbone_Helmet.esp" in your launcher.

Uninstall:
Delete "DS_to_Dragonbone_Helmet.esp"

Check out my other Mods :
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1021]Dragonplate and Draconscale to Nightingale[/url]
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1124]Ancient Shrouded to Forsworn[/url]
author: Sordac
